edu.uw.medhas.mhealthsecurityframework.acl.service

Interface RoleService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RoleServiceImpl

    public interface RoleService
    This interface contains methods to create a Role and delete a Role.
    Author:
    Medha Srivastava Created by medhas on 2/18/19.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createRole(Role role, AuthContext authContext, ResultHandler<Role> resultHandler)
      Creates a role.
      void deleteRole(java.lang.String roleName, AuthContext authContext, ResultHandler<java.lang.Void> resultHandler)
      Deletes a role.

    • Method Detail

      • createRole

        void createRole(Role role,
                AuthContext authContext,
                ResultHandler<Role> resultHandler)
        Creates a role.
        Parameters:
        role - role to be created
        authContext - details of the current user
        resultHandler - listener to store the result of the query

      • deleteRole

        void deleteRole(java.lang.String roleName,
                AuthContext authContext,
                ResultHandler<java.lang.Void> resultHandler)
        Deletes a role.
        Parameters:
        roleName - Name of role to be deleted
        authContext - details of the current user
        resultHandler - listener to store the result of the query
